Articles.Content:
This is Explorer one, it has 4 overall stages (not including empty ones) and an unknown top speed, as it catastrophically. Here is footage from a CCTV camera.

Explorer Two is our next venture, it will actually be able to take you into space!
I like the frantic cycling through stages as they plummet
yeah looks like you have way to much thrust for that single coupler.. not sure which one you are using though since its hidden by the other engines.

mmm i noticed here to a error in the big orange tanks,

if you watch closely you see the engine fall off.

it happens to me to every time.

that could be a major problem to whith this ship
check the flight log and it will tell you which part fails first..
